get.summary: Counter returns the current counter value.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: address defines the address to query for the counter.

get.summary: Counters returns all the counter values.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

count.description: count defines the count of the counter.

address.description: address defines the address that is associated with the count.

sonrhq.service.v1.Counter.description:
Counter defines a counter object.
It is used only for genesis purposes. Collections does not need to use it.

sonrhq.service.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters of the module.

counter.description: counter defines the current counter for the sender.

sonrhq.service.v1.QueryCounterResponse.description:
QueryCounterResponse is the response type for the Query/Counter RPC
method.

counters.description: counters defines all the counters in the store.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

sonrhq.service.v1.QueryCountersResponse.description:
QueryCountersResponse is the response type for the Query/Counters RPC
method.

params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

sonrhq.service.v1.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
